scripts.local:mustache: mustache src/config/contracts.local.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && mustache src/config/contracts.local.json src/utils/helpers.template.ts > src/utils/helpers.ts
scripts.staging:mustache: mustache src/config/contracts.staging.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && mustache src/config/contracts.staging.json src/utils/helpers.template.ts > src/utils/helpers.ts
scripts.testing:mustache: mustache src/config/contracts.testing.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && mustache src/config/contracts.testing.json src/utils/helpers.template.ts > src/utils/helpers.ts
scripts.local:deploy: graph deploy --product hosted-service spool/core-v2 subgraph.yaml --ipfs http://localhost:5001 --node http://127.0.0.1:8020 -l 1.0
scripts.staging:deploy: graph deploy --product hosted-service spool/core-v2 subgraph.yaml --ipfs http://3.120.126.253:5001 --node http://3.120.126.253:8020 -l 1.0
scripts.testing:deploy: graph deploy --product hosted-service spool/core-v2 subgraph.yaml --ipfs http://35.159.49.24:5001 --node http://35.159.49.24:8020 -l 1.0
